subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Jones said he was O.K. with not being allowed to sit on the bench with his Virginia teammates at Madison Square Garden — his role is to make his teammates better at practice.
snippet: Jeff Jones said he was O.K. with not being allowed to sit on the bench with his Virginia teammates at Madison Square Garden — his role is to make his teammates better at practice.
